name: Doris F. BELL, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS AND RETIREMENT, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Bell v. City of Philadelphia Board of Pensions & Retirement

judges: Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Doris F. BELL, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS AND RETIREMENT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of September, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is DENIED.
Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 224
Doris F. BELL, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS AND RETIREMENT, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 10, 2008.
